cluster_relations.rel_desc: Fairytales convey moral lessons within their narratives.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Narrative works that communicate or teach moral lessons through their content.
remarks: Relation name chosen to emphasize didactic function rather than mere inclusion.
Relation name chosen to emphasize didactic function rather than mere inclusion.

cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Narrative works that communicate or teach moral lessons through their content.

args.canonical_rel_desc: Narrative works that convey a moral or ethical lesson to the audience through their content.
args.justification: Both relations link narrative works (fairytales, timeless stories) to moral lessons with a clear didactic function. Normalizing the predicate to the singular form 'conveys_moral_lesson' improves consistency and avoids unnecessary plurality variation. The previous rel_cls 'narrative_effect_relation' was vague; 'didactic_function_relation' more precisely captures that this is about the didactic function or effect of the narrative, while retaining the broad rel_cls_group 'EFFECT' to indicate the outcome/impact of the narrative content.

executed_decisions.canonical_rel_desc: Narrative works that convey a moral or ethical lesson to the audience through their content.
executed_decisions.justification: Both relations link narrative works (fairytales, timeless stories) to moral lessons with a clear didactic function. Normalizing the predicate to the singular form 'conveys_moral_lesson' improves consistency and avoids unnecessary plurality variation. The previous rel_cls 'narrative_effect_relation' was vague; 'didactic_function_relation' more precisely captures that this is about the didactic function or effect of the narrative, while retaining the broad rel_cls_group 'EFFECT' to indicate the outcome/impact of the narrative content.
